message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
Come on, Alice! 58-42 is a great deal for you!
I'm willing to give you a little more, Bob, but I won't let you take advantage of me. 55-45 is the best I can do!
Alice, the money is worth 28.1% less to you now. This is the best offer you'll get. Take it or leave it!
